item.title: Judge blocks dismantling of CFPB, orders employees reinstated
item.description: The judge's order requires the Trump administration to reinstate terminated CFPB employees among other steps.

item.title: Columbia University Interim president stepping down, university says
item.description: Columbia University Interim President Katrina Armstrong is stepping down, according to the university.

item.title: Emotional Education Department 'clap-outs' celebrate departed federal employees
item.description: Dozens of emotional Department of Education employees took part in a final "clap-out" in D.C. after losing jobs amid the Trump administration's agency...

item.title: Myanmar-Thailand earthquake live updates: Casualties expected to rise amid search
item.description: A 7.7 magnitude earthquake rattled much of Southeast Asia on Friday, flattening skyscrapers and leaving more than 150 people dead from Myanmar to Thai...

item.title: Trump says 'we can't' do without Greenland as Vance tours territory
